column5: Hi! I have a lovely room for rent as well as the whole house on a separate Listing. Come Stay for the SXSW, Formula 1 Events, Concerts, to Swim and Float the MANY rivers nearby ... or just come to have a nice get away. Gorgeous tree filled lot. Quiet country setting. 15 miles to DT Austin, 15 minutes to San Marcos. Price listed for 1 room. If you need a whole house, please check my other listing.
column8: Beautiful Home & Yard - CLOSE TO TONS OF FUN!
